name: Soft-Shell Crab Sandwiches With Red-Pepper Mayonnaise
keywords: bread, crab, red pepper, main course
recipeIngredient: 2 roasted red peppers, skinned and seeded

recipeInstructions.text: To make the mayonnaise, puree the peppers in a blender until smooth. Scrape into a small saucepan and cook over medium-low heat until reduced by half, about 10 minutes. Let cool. Stir in the mayonnaise, cayenne and salt. Refrigerate at least 1 hour.

To make the crabs, combine the flour, salt and pepper in a shallow dish. Coat the crabs in the flour mixture. Heat the butter in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Add the crabs and saute until cooked through, about 4 minutes per side.
Spread 4 slices of bread with 2 tablespoons of mayonnaise each. Top with a crab, shredded lettuce and bread. Serve immediately.
